alert.note: Alert for Golden Valley; Southern Wheatland (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 11:22PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN WHEATLAND AND CENTRAL GOLDEN VALLEY COUNTIES THROUGH 1145 PM MDT... At 1121 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Deadmans Basin Reservoir, or 22 miles southeast of Harlowton, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. Frequent lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ryegate, Deadmans Basin Reservoir, Lavina, Franklin, and Shawmut. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
